from notebookutils import mssparkutils

json_schema_path = harmonised_storage_container + '/' + json_schema_folder

print('json_schema_path '+json_schema_path)

files = mssparkutils.fs.ls(json_schema_path)

json_schema_files = []

for fi in files:
  json_schema_files.append(fi.name)

json_string_list=[]

for file_name in json_schema_files:
    json_schema_file_path = json_schema_path + '/' + file_name
    df=spark.read.text(json_schema_file_path)
    table = [x["value"] for x in df.rdd.collect()]
    json_string = ""

    for item in table:
        json_string += item

    json_string_list.append(json_string)

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, DataType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType ,DoubleType
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import sys, traceback
import json

schema_list=[]
i=0

archive_folder = harmonised_storage_container + 'config/json_files/old' 

for json_string in json_string_list:
    json_file = ''
    try:
        json_file = json_schema_path+json_schema_files[i]
        table_name= json_schema_files[i].split('.')[0]
        print('---------creating table '+table_name)
        print('---------from file '+json_file)
        schema = StructType.fromJson(json.loads(json_string))
        harmonised_storage_delta_table_path = harmonised_storage_container + '/' + harmonised_storage_delta_folder + '/' + table_name

        if not (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark,harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)):
            harmonisationInspectordf = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)
            harmonisationInspectordf.write.option("mergeSchema", "true").format('delta').mode('overwrite').save(harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)
            spark.sql("CREATE TABLE {0}.{1} USING DELTA LOCATION '{2}'".format(delta_lake_database_name,table_name,harmonised_storage_delta_table_path))
            mssparkutils.fs.mv(json_file, archive_folder)
    except Exception as e:
        print('------------Error in File '+json_file)
        traceback.print_exc(file=sys.stdout)
    i += 1
